description: EXAMPLE Configuration - Copy this to config.json and customize for your machine
inputDirectoryDescription: Path to the OnShore legacy VB.NET codebase

paths.pathsDescription: Relative paths within the inputDirectory to find legacy source files

referenceProjects.description: Reference projects showing ASP.NET Core MVC patterns and examples

targetProjects.description: Target projects where generated code will be placed (BargeOps.Admin.Mono monorepo structure)

notes: 1. Copy this file to config.json: cp config.example.json config.json
2. Update inputDirectory to point to your OnShore legacy codebase
3. Update referenceProjects to point to your BargeOps.Crewing projects
4. Update targetProjects to point to your BargeOps.Admin.Mono monorepo
- All paths should use double backslashes (\\) for Windows paths
- Use absolute paths for all directories
- The 'paths' object contains relative paths within inputDirectory
- config.json is gitignored so your local paths won't be committed
